articles.title: Mon premier
articles.content: Oh, loneliness and cheeseburgers are a dangerous mix. Jesus must be spinning in his grave! Oh, loneliness and cheeseburgers are a dangerous mix. No children have ever meddled with the Republican Party and lived to tell about it.
articles.author: Moi&Moi

articles.title: Mon deuxième article
articles.content: Kids, kids. I'm not going to die. That only happens to bad people. You know, the one with all the well meaning rules that don't work out in real life, uh, Christianity. Inflammable means flammable? What a country.
articles.author: Moi

articles.title: Mon troisième article
articles.content: Mon troisième article est vraiment génial !
articles.author: Moi
